examples.translation: 凡是忠于职守的人都值得奖励。
examples.first: He who does his duty is

adj: having worth or merit or value; being honorable or admirable
worthy of being chosen especially as a spouse
having qualities or abilities that merit recognition in some way
n: an important, honorable person (word is often used humorously)

adj: 有价值的,可尊敬的,值得的,配得上的
n: 知名人士, 杰出人物
